review: If you're buying this unit for "rooting" purposes to install 3rd party apps then forget about it. Amazon has now blocked this feature with it's new OS 51.1.3.0. Also, I believe it automatically starts download and installing even if it ships with an older, "rootable" version of it's OS. To me, not being able to modify this streamer is like a car dealer selling you a new car, at full price but locking out the stereo so you can't change the channel.As far as using it as Amazon intended I still give it 3 stars. The remote voice control only works with Amazon Prime, not netflix and the Bluetooth capabilities only work with Amazon's gaming controller (sold separately). FAIL!
